p: The microbial complexity in the ileum and caecum of broiler chickens was estimated by calculating the number of observed OTUs, the estimated OTU richness (Chao1) or the estimated community diversity (Shannon index) in each sample. No significant alterations in either the caecal or ileal bacterial richness or diversity were introduced by supplementation of the diet with resin acids (FigureÂ 1).
